title: Sherrie Hewson breaks down and reveals cancer scare on Loose Women - Showbiz
text: Loose Women's Sherrie Hewson broke down on the show earlier today (October 9), revealing she found a lump days before she went into the Celebrity Big Brother house - and didn't do anything about it because she was too scared to.Sherrie said she felt she couldn't make the news public because of the "work" she had to do, competing in the reality TV show. © Channel 5Sherrie Hewson "I had a lump a few years ago, but… only a few weeks ago, which I've never told anybody, I found another one," she explained on the show. "It was me who found it, I didn't tell anybody, I went to hospital… but I was going into the Big Brother house and I didn't want to say anything because obviously I'm working and I have to earn, I'm the only bread winner in the family." She added that she regretted her decision not to talk about her discovery and warned others not to make the same mistake: "Stupidly, and please don't ever do this, anybody, don't not tell somebody. I went in, frightened, and came out, I went back to hospital, fortunately it was only a cyst."All I'm saying is, my fear was A) I didn't want to know, and B) I didn't want to tell anybody. And I think, really, if you look at everybody in a street, they would tell you that was one of the biggest problems, is terror, is not being able to look, touch, feel, and go, 'It could be me, well actually I'll put my head in the sand and I'll pretend it's not me'… © Channel 5 "I think that's what happened to me. It was the most stupid thing I have ever done in my life. So if anybody's listening, please don't do what I did."Today's episode of Loose Women was marking Breast Cancer Awareness Month with Britain's biggest Survivors' Party, celebrating those who have survived breast cancer.Loose Women airs on ITV on weekdays at 12.30pm.
